title: ISIS Used Predatory Tools And Tactics To Convince U.S. Teens To Join
teaser: It began with messages sent through an anonymous app. Slowly, the Denver-area girls were lured in, until one day they weren't at school. One girl's dad quickly realized why: They were flying to Syria.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
